name: Salary Warrior
description:
★ Game description ★
For whatever reason, the breeding power of the monster continues to grow in the kingdom!
The kingdom is looking for contractors to solve this.
Become a salary warrior from the kingdom!
If you work hard, you can also earn high salary by negotiating salary!
Also we have a lot of events ~!
Dungeons are ready!
Various dungeons and contents will be provided in the future!

Install it during the initial event, you can get more benefits!

Then, Let's meet in the breeding dungeon !!

★ Notice ★
It support the cloud save but it may not be saved properly.
So I recommend you do not erase the game as much as possible.
(The cloud save is compatible only with Android devices.)

★ Good rating and Google + 1 is really really help for indie game developers!
★ Please recommend your friends!
★ Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/tabomsoft

★ Required permissions ★
1. Call and manage (READ_PHONE_STATE):
Need to create game ID through device ID of game device

  1. Address Book Access (GET_ACCOUNTS):
    Used Google account to block that attempt to abuse for the same ad and game pushing

  2. Access device photos, media, and files (WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE / READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE):
    It is necessary to temporarily save or load the various options (ex: sound, optimization, etc.) required for the game to the device

... I wish rose my salary too ...
